works.description:
The following major motion picture and film "NUMB" is our copyrighted work and more information on this work can be found here http://aloeentertainment.com/thisfilm.php?film=numb and here: 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0795439/fullcredits#cast

We have been in the middle of a cyberstalking case where pirates have been posting download links to torrents of our works. 

We have notified ISPs and have had some success in shutting them down but they have gotten smarter. What they have done now is use GOOGLE SHORT LINKS! 

If you look on the page of the link for the infringing material, you will see:

***** BEGIN TEXT *****
"Twitter Shortened Linking - Numb - http://goo.gl/2YJrL
***** END TEXT *****

If you click on the link http://goo.gl/2YJrL it will link straight to a torrent pirate download. There are also torrent pirate download links too on some of the entries: 

E.G. thepiratebay.se/torrent/4178520/
